data.name: Potion Blast
data.detailed_description:
A four player brawler in which you pick and mix elemental potions to blast the most powerful spells at your ennemies. Battle around the world of Orvia and travel through it's mystical lands. The last magician standing wins !

  • Mix up to four elemental potions to cast up to 20+ spells of varying power
  • 2-4 local multiplayer for some serious couch fighting
  • Variety of higly detailed maps
  • 2.5D platforming
  • 4 Unique playable characters (more coming)

Visit the different cities of Orvia to know more about the Alchemist's Tome and all the secrets it withholds !
